column4: Hi guys. I want to play a game called Nexuiz but it keeps crashing on me all the time the moment it shows a lot of gunfire. And with crashing i mean the whole computer freezes. My videocard is an ATI Radeon 9600 and i'm using the open-source 'ati' driver.
maybe there is no way to make it work because of the drivers and the old card. Maybe you need a faster processor or more memory.
That's not an old card. Before this i had an ATI Radeon 9250. (And don't worry, i've reinstalled Ubuntu)
and other games work just fine.
in that case, I envy you.
